nodes.text: The Lunatic Fringer was a light cruiser that was used by the pilot Keb Nevrunn during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

In c. 31 BBY, the Rodian Renna, a friend of Nevrunn, arranged for the ship to transport the Heroes of Cularin, a group of freelance agents who were making a delivery for Renna's Transport Service. However, while the Fringer was returning from the assignment, the ship became caught in the Cularin system asteroid belt due to the actions of a shadow creature, which was draining passing starships of power.

The Lunatic Fringer appears in the Living Force adventure Philosophy, and is loaned to the players—who role-play as the Heroes of Cularin—if the player characters do not own a starship of their own and do not have the skills to fly one.
